本插件wiki中作者已配置好两张游戏地图供大家使用，只需根据自己需要修改部分内容即可
× 已知漏洞极小可能的情况下更换服务器版本时会崩溃在更换服务器版本前，请及时备份———— 插件特色 ———— 网络稳定 高度配置 MySql & Bungee支持 排行榜功能(Top1-10) 多语言支持 多竞技场 免费和开源(永远)无限套装数量(需装附属插件) 官方Wiki免费地图(wiki中下载)评价和维护良好还有更多！ ———— 命令&权限 ————[必要参数] (选填参数) 玩家命令 命令所需权限说明/vd join [arena]villagedefense.join.%arena%
villagedefense.join.* (所有竞技场)加入指定竞技场/vd randomjoin需要villagedefense.join.* 权限加入所有竞技场随机加入一个未开始竞技场/vd stats (在线玩家)无查看你(或他人)的游戏信息/vd leave无退出当前游戏. 你可以在config.yml文件中关闭它/vd top [statistic]无查看Top10榜/vd selectkitvillagedefense.command.selectkit在游戏中更换套装
 管理命令 
你可以使用 villagedefense.admin.* 权限给予玩家所有管理权限

命令所需权限说明有效执行者无villagedefense.updatenotify插件更新通知权限无无villagedefense.command.override在游戏中不限制使用任何命令无无villagedefense.admin.sign.create (创建游戏木牌) villagedefense.admin.sign.break (破坏游戏木牌)你可以创建或破坏木牌无/vd create [arena]villagedefense.admin.create创建竞技场玩家/vd [arena] editvillagedefense.admin.create编辑竞技场玩家/vda listvillagedefense.admin.list列出可用竞技场玩家/后台/vda stopvillagedefense.admin.stopgame停止你正在游戏的竞技场玩家/vda forcestartvillagedefense.admin.forcestart强制启动你所在的竞技场玩家/vda respawn (player)villagedefense.admin.respawn villagedefense.admin.respawn.others在你所在竞技场指定一个玩家重生玩家/vda spychatvillagedefense.admin.spychat切换竞技场聊天可见性(仅限于多竞技场)玩家/vda reloadvillagedefense.admin.reload重载插件(这将停止所有进行的游戏，不建议使用此命令)玩家/后台/vda delete [arena]villagedefense.admin.delete删除竞技场玩家/vda tp [arena] [location type]villagedefense.admin.teleport传送到竞技场的指定位置
位置类型:START(开始), END(结束), LOBBY(大厅)玩家/vda clear [zombie/villager/golem/wolf]villagedefense.admin.clear清理竞技场中指定的实体玩家/vda addorbs [amount] (player)villagedefense.admin.addorbs villagedefense.admin.addorbs.others向你或你指定的玩家增加硬币玩家/后台(指定其他玩家时)/vda addlevel [number] (player)villagedefense.admin.addlevel增加玩家等级玩家/后台/vda setlevel [number] (player)villagedefense.admin.setlevel设置玩家等级玩家/后台/vda setwave [number]villagedefense.admin.setwave设置游戏波数玩家/vda setprice [amount]villagedefense.admin.setprice设置物品价格(放在商店中，否则商店不会起作用)玩家———— 教程&提示 ———— 视频有点渣，但我也废了好长时间在做，能看就看吧
https://www.bilibili.com/video/av41128801/视频里的第二个Tip说的有些错误，是把任意物品改名成Spawn Wolf/Golem分别是生成狼和铁傀儡(如使用了官方的中文语言，那么Spawn Wolf/Golem可以写成 “召唤 狼”/“召唤 傀儡”)插件修改中文语言
打开插件config.yml文件，找到如下文字
locale: default复制代码default 改为 zh 即可(不要复制代码)
locale: zh复制代码应15楼的反应，高版本的语言文件用不了，但是我测试可以用，为了以防万一，在帖子里再放出一份语言文件

4.0.4 - Valentine's Day update   情人节更新！
[Added]Special Valentine's Day effects: 情人节特效
Heart arrow trailsSpecial Valentine power-up (if power-ups are enabled) that heal player who pickups it! 情人节能力(如果能力为开启)可以治疗拾取它的玩家
Valentine's Day event in Village Defense will occur for4 days before and 4 days afterthe Valentine's Day so starting from today  Village Defense在情人节前后四天(一共9天?)举行情人节活动
You can disable Halloween and Valentine's Day events in config, just setHolidays-Enabledtofalse  你可以在config中禁用万圣节和情人节特殊活动事件，设置Holidays-Enabled为false即可


4.0.3 - New non flickering scoreboard
[Added]Portuguese Brazil locales are here! Thanks to POEditor community!  新增语言:葡萄牙语
[Changed]Prettified entity upgrades particle effects a bit  经过修饰的实体稍微提升了粒子效果[Changed]Added new non flickering scoreboard  新增无闪烁计分板
[Fixed]NPE when rewards section was null#449(thanks to@Toldi)   奖励为null问题
[Fixed]NPE when /vda setwave command was typed without argument set#474    输入/vda setwave时无参数集


4.0.2 - Some fixes
[ Fixed] #415 error caused by /vda setprice without price argument 修复/vda setprice指令无price参数的错误#415
[ Fixed] Removed 'return' code line from onDisable method while saving user data into MySQL (only MySQL), only 1 stat for 1 player could be saved  从onDisable方法中删除 'return' 代码, 同时将用户数据保存到到MySQL(仅MySQL),只保存一个玩家的一个统计信息[ Fixed] Fixed error on disable which lead data not to be saved (reported by @zuhir) 修复了禁用而数据无法保存的错误(由 zuhir提供报告)


4.0.1 - Fresh fixes
[Added]Pro tip about user voice panel where you can suggest new ideas or vote for current ones! 关于用户语音面板的专业提示 你可以在其中提出新想法或投票当前想法点击网址查看
Check out yourselfhttps://plajer.xyz/uservoice/index.php?id=VillageDefense
[Added]Tip about special items that can be added into game shop when setting up shop via setup menu 关于通过设置菜单设置商店时可以添加特殊物品到商店的提示
[Fixed]There was no check for max tier of entities upgrades and you could infinitely upgrade entities to tier 5 (reported by@zuhir) 不检查实体最大升级数，可以无限制的升级到5级 (由 zuhir 提供报告)[Fixed]Fixed#409caused by Golem's Final Defense upgrade (reported by@zuhir) 修复了由傀儡技能引起的报错#409(由 zuhir提供报告)
[Fixed]Errors when plugin was disabled and arenas couldn't properly reset (reported by@zuhir) 插件被禁用且竞技场无法正确重置的出错(由 zuhir提供报告)



4.0.0 - New era is here
It's a big one! 这是一个大更新！4.0.0 pre-release users must reset language.yml!4.0.0预发布版用户必须重置language.yml文件！

[Added]Limited rotten flesh hearts level that users can get to 30 (prevents tons of hearts that will break game fun) 限制腐肉升级血量等级到30 (防止玩家拥有大量的血量破坏游戏乐趣)[Added]Zombie idle processor to save server load and prevent lag! Game will halt spawning zombies for x seconds (wave / 15 rounded down) in wave to save performance a bit without spawning tons of hordes at once.  僵尸闲置处理器可以节省服务器负载并防止滞后！游戏将暂停生成僵尸 X（波数/15  向下取舍）秒，以节省一点性能而不会一次产生大量的僵尸[Added]Zombie spawn limiter, maximum of 750 zombies can be spawned in wave now, any amount higher will be set to 750 and zombies will receive extra hearts as waves increments. Health is based on (zombies this wave - 750 / 15 rounded up)   僵尸生成限制，每一波最多能生成750个僵尸，任何超过750的数量都将被设置成750并且随着波数的增加僵尸的血量也会增加。血量是基于(波数 - 750/15 ?四舍五入)[Added]Game will now clean rotten fleshes from ground spawned after game ends in arena world in radius of 150 blocks near arena start location     游戏将在结束时把游戏世界中以游戏开始位置为中心半径150格的方块范围内的地面上的腐肉清理掉[Added]Tab completer for some command arguments 某些命令的参数补全
[Added]Legacy data converter for YAML files, data saved in YAML was broken since ~3.11.x, user data will migrate safely and player stats will be updated   YAML的旧数据转换器，YAML在 ~3.11.x版本被破坏，使用它用户数据将会安全的迁移并更新玩家统计信息[Added]Italian locale  意大利语言
[Added]Added useSSL=false argument in mysql.yml database to avoid not harmful warnings in console (you can add it yourself to disable them too)  在mysql.yml增加了 useSSL=false 选项，用来避免后台出现无用警告(你可以自己添加这个选项来禁止它)
[Added]/vda clear wolf argument to clear spawned wolves in arena                /vda clear wolf 指令 清除竞技场中生成的狼
[Added]Totally new entity upgrade system implemented! Shift + click to open it for golems and wolves!!!   全新的实体升级系统！对准铁傀儡和狼Shift+右键 打开升级界面[Added]Wave limiter - limit how many waves game can play  波数限制 - 限制最高到达多少波[Added]/vda setlevel and /vda addlevel commands were added    添加 /vda setlevel 和 /vda addlevel 命令[Added]JavaScript engine into rewards.yml secion, you can execute java code from rewards now.  rewaeds.yml引入JavaScript代码，你可以用java代码给予玩家奖励了[Added]Over8other additions  其他添加内容超过八项
[Changed]Whole code performance went up! Just check out your timings this time! 提高整个代码性能！
[Changed]Buffed and nerfed cleaner kit ability, he can now use it every 60 seconds but it will clean only spawned zombies 他现在可以每隔60秒使用一次buffed和nerfed cleaner 套装能力?，但它只会清理生成的僵尸
[Changed]Zombies won't spam lava particles on death via command/powerup/cleaner kit, now if there will be over 70 spawned zombies every third will only spawn particle to prevent client lag 通过/powerup/cleaner kit 命令死亡的僵尸不会产生岩浆粒子效果，现在如果生成的僵尸超过70个将会有三分之一的僵尸产生粒子以防止客户端滞后
[Changed]Whole API is now improved! 改进整个API
[Changed]Over7other changes 其他更改内容超过七项
[Fixed]Arena signs weren't properly saved via setup menu (4.0.0 pre-releases bug) 游戏木牌未能通过设置界面保存(4.0.0预发布版BUG)
[Fixed]/vda forcestart didn't start the game when there weren't enough players to start 当没有足够的玩家开始游戏时, /vda forcestart没有正确的强制启动游戏
[Fixed]Worlds were generated if arenas.yml contains their names (reported by@Blackyvk) 如果arenas.yml包含了地图名字，那么将会自动生成世界(由 Blackyvk提供报告)
[Fixed]Worker kit wasn't displayed on 1.11-1.12 (reported by@Blackyvk) Worker套装未在1.11-1.12版本显示(由 Blackyvk提供报告)[Fixed]Doors couldn't be placed in game nor zombies could break them on 1.11-1.12 (reported by@Blackyvk) 门不能在游戏中放置并且僵尸也不会打破门(由 Blackyvk提供报告)
[Fixed]Commands without permissions weren't working (4.0.0 pre-releases issue) 没有权限的命令无法使用(4.0.0预发布版问题)[Fixed]Setup menu wasn't working (4.0.0 pre-releases issue) 设置菜单无法使用(4.0.0预发布版问题)
[Fixed]Now not localized Spawn Golem/Wolf items will work with locales and in shops 现在非本地生成的傀儡/狼将于本地生成的商店一起使用
[Fixed]Over11other fixes  其他修复内容超过11项
[Deleted]Villagers won't stay in arena after the game ends anymore 游戏结束后村民不会留在竞技场
